options.content:
![svg image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)


# On-Prem Sustainability Dashboard

This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic application resource manager on Energy consumption and Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your on-premise environments.

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*24*365/1000 as "kWh/year"
FROM pending_action a
where
  a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
  a.description like '%VCPU%' AND a.description not like '%limit%'

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Energy Consumption

panels.description: List of all applications in the selected scope sorted by the ones with the most carbon emissions over the selected period at the top. Carbon emissions associated with application groups are of the VMs that are part of each application group.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  concat(eapp.name, ' (', eapp.oid,')') as "Application Name",
  eapp.oid as "Application OID",
  s.scoped_oid as "VM OID",
  eapp.type as "Grouping Type"
FROM scope s
join entity eapp on eapp.oid = s.seed_oid
where
  s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
  AND s.finish > now()
  AND eapp.last_seen > now()
  AND ((eapp.type = 'GROUP' AND eapp.attrs->'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' ) OR (eapp.type = 'BUSINESS_APPLICATION'))
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  --mvm.time as "Time",
  mvm.entity_oid as "VM OID",
  sum(mvm.current)*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${EFFICIENCY}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}/1000 as "CO2e (t)"
FROM metric mvm
where 
  $__timeFilter(mvm.time) AND
  mvm.entity_oid IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  mvm.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  mvm.type = 'VCPU' AND
  mvm.current>0
GROUP BY "VM OID"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Top Applications by CO2e emissions

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${EFFICIENCY}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
where
  a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
  a.description like '%VCPU%' AND a.description not like '%limit%'

panels.title: Request Resize Actions Impact on CO2

options.content: # Sustainability Impact This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic Actions on Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your on-premise environment.

panels.description: This shows the latest data point for the total number of VMs in the selected scope.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  count(m.current)
FROM metric m
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  --m.entity_oid IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  m.entity_type='VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  m.type = 'VCPU'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total Number of VMs

panels.description: Current number of pending VM Resize actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM pending_action a
where
a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST})
AND a.description like '%VCPU%'

panels.title: Current Number of Resize Actions

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
where
  a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
  a.description like '%VCPU%' AND a.description not like '%limit%'

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Cores

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*24*365/1000 as "kWh/year"
FROM pending_action a
where
  a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
  a.description like '%VCPU%' AND a.description not like '%limit%'

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Energy Consumption

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${EFFICIENCY}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
where
  a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST}) AND
  a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
  a.description like '%VCPU%' AND a.description not like '%limit%'

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on CO2e

panels.description: Current number of pending VM Resize actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e.name as "Name",
  a.severity as "Severity",
  a.description as "Description",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
where
a.target_entity_id IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST})
AND a.category != 'COMPLIANCE'
AND a.description like '%VCPU%'

panels.title: Current Resize Actions

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM entity WHERE (type = 'NAMESPACE' AND name NOT LIKE '%kube-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%openshift-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%open-cluster%' ) LIMIT 50
list.label: Namespace
list.name: NAMESPACE
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM entity WHERE (type = 'NAMESPACE' AND name NOT LIKE '%kube-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%openshift-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%open-cluster%' ) LIMIT 50

list.description: Maximum consumption of your Private Cloud hosts in Watts. You can refer the the "All Published SPECpower_ssh2008 Results" link to get the values for your specific host.
list.label: PUE
list.name: PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE

list.description: Private Cloud Emissions Factor corresponds to 1,562.4 lbs CO2/MWh  (4.536  10^(-4) metric tons/lb)  0.001 MWh/kWh = 7.09  10^(-4) metric tons CO2/kWh
list.label: Emissions Factor
list.name: PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR

list.definition:
SELECT
  distinct e.oid
FROM entity e
WHERE
  (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
list.label: VM_ENERGY_LIST
list.name: VM_ENERGY_LIST
list.query:
SELECT
  distinct e.oid
FROM entity e
WHERE
  (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'

list.definition:
SELECT
    concat(e.name, ' (', e.oid, ')') AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
FROM entity e
join scope s on e.oid = s.scoped_oid and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' 
WHERE
  (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  e.oid IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST})
ORDER BY e.name
list.name: VM_LIST
list.query:
SELECT
    concat(e.name, ' (', e.oid, ')') AS __text,
    e.oid AS __value
FROM entity e
join scope s on e.oid = s.scoped_oid and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' 
WHERE
  (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) AND
  e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
  e.oid IN (${VM_ENERGY_LIST})
ORDER BY e.name
